img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 40.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_UpperHollow_40.jpg)
When up close, he'll usually either perform an overhand slash followed by a leaping attack, or he'll pull back his swords to your left for two quick slashes followed by a dash attack.
img_below_text:
Be ready for him to leap back with two more slashes after the dash, and wait until he returns to counter -- or simply Rock Solid his dash attack to stagger him back.
![Wukong UpperHollow 41.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0d/Wukong_UpperHollow_41.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 42 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 40.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_UpperHollow_40.jpg)
When up close, he'll usually either perform an overhand slash followed by a leaping attack, or he'll pull back his swords to your left for two quick slashes followed by a dash attack."
            - Following Text: "Be ready for him to leap back with two more slashes after the dash, and wait until he returns to counter -- or simply Rock Solid his dash attack to stagger him back.
![Wukong UpperHollow 41.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0d/Wukong_UpperHollow_41.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts an intense battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring the protagonist Wukong facing off against a formidable enemy known as the Venom Daoist. The preceding text describes the enemy's attack patterns, including overhand slashes, leaping attacks, and quick slashes followed by a dash. The following text advises players to anticipate additional slashes after the dash and suggests countering or using the Rock Solid ability to stagger the enemy. The image visually captures the dynamic and challenging nature of this encounter, highlighting the combat mechanics and strategies players need to employ.
